description: Generate text using Amazon Bedrock LLMs.

inputs.name: model_id
inputs.info: List of available model IDs to choose from.

inputs.name: aws_access_key_id
inputs.info: The access key for your AWS account.Usually set in Python code as the environment variable 'AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID'.

inputs.name: aws_secret_access_key
inputs.info: The secret key for your AWS account. Usually set in Python code as the environment variable 'AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY'.

inputs.name: aws_session_token
inputs.info: The session key for your AWS account. Only needed for temporary credentials. Usually set in Python code as the environment variable 'AWS_SESSION_TOKEN'.

inputs.name: credentials_profile_name
inputs.info: The name of the profile to use from your ~/.aws/credentials file. If not provided, the default profile will be used.

inputs.name: region_name
inputs.info: The AWS region where your Bedrock resources are located.

inputs.name: model_kwargs
inputs.info: Additional keyword arguments to pass to the model.

inputs.name: endpoint_url
inputs.info: The URL of the Bedrock endpoint to use.
